pickup.title: Delivery
pickup.self: Self-Pickup: Collection of products from the store, address Amsterdam Street 3, Sderot.
zones: Zone 1: Ra'anana, Ashkelon, Kiryat Malachi, Kiryat Gat, Ashdod, and surrounding settlements - ₪250.00
Zone 2: Rehovot, Givatayim, Ramat Hasharon, Petah Tikva, Rosh HaAyin, Tel Aviv, and surrounding settlements - ₪350.00
Zone 3: Sderot, Be'er Sheva, Ofakim, Netivot, Ashkelon, and settlements in the surrounding area - ₪300.00
Zone 4: Jerusalem, Beit Shemesh, and surrounding settlements - ₪500.00
Zone 5: Hadera, Netanya, Haifa, and settlements in the north - ₪900.00

main.text: Mutag Haetz, located in the city of Sderot, is a company with over a decade of successful experience. The company has established itself as a leading figure wood products, specializing in the sale of high-quality oak wood items.

In the import sector, Mutag Haetz boasts rich experience and proven reliability. As an experienced importer, the company focuses on marketing a wide variety of products, including Oak wood, Oak panels, slabs, Finger-joint and more.

Mutag Haetz prides itself on its ability to deliver products of utmost quality. Additionally, the company offers a diverse range of products, including dictums, complementary accessories, and more, ensuring comprehensive and reliable solutions for every project.

features.title: Available 24/7 for any questions you may have

form.successMsg1: Thanks for choosing our premium wood products.
form.successMsg2: We're committed to swift communication—expect us to reach out promptly.  We're here to meet your wood supply needs efficiently.

hero.title: Wood bringing nature to your home – quality and admiration in every board and beam!
hero.desc: High-quality wood products: Oak stairs, finger joint , and vario boards. Crafted with care, bringing the warmth and beauty of wood to Israel. Expertise and quality in every project, capturing the authentic feel of oak wood.

catalog.desc: Explore the epitome of craftsmanship in our catalog, where every product tells a story of timeless elegance. Our collection showcases the beauty of oak wood in various forms, from exquisite oak stairs that redefine your space to the raw allure of solid oak timber. Dive into the versatility of our offerings, including the environmentally conscious Lami Oak and innovative Oak BIO Board, crafted to inspire your interior design journey. Each product in our wood collection reflects a commitment to quality, ensuring that every piece, whether it's a simple wood panel or a complex timber creation, is a testament to the natural beauty and enduring charm of wood. Welcome to a world where wood becomes art, and every selection, from oak stairs to timber wonders, transforms your space into a masterpiece.

contactDesc.title: Efficient Oak Delivery Solutions Across Israel: Connecting Cities, Meeting Your Needs!
contactDesc.towns: We are delighted to be your suppliers in various cities, including Ashkelon, Ashdod, Be'er Sheva, Kiryat Gat, Netivot, Ofakim, Jerusalem, Tel Aviv, Haifa, Rishon LeZion, Petah Tikva, Netanya, Herzliya, Holon, Eilat, Beer Sheva, Kfar Saba, Rehovot, Hod HaSharon, and Modiin.
contactDesc.delivery: Our trucks and couriers are ready to deliver to your location. Don't forget that we are available for communication on social networks,
contactDesc.askQuestions: and through a convenient form on the website. Stay connected, and our managers will be sure to answer all your questions.
